movie.title: Ice Age: A Mammoth Christmas
movie.description_intro: When Sid accidentally destroys Manny's heirloom Christmas rock and ends up on Santa's naughty list, he leads a hilarious quest to the North Pole to make things right and ends up making things much worse. Now it's up to Manny and his prehistoric posse to band together and save Christmas for the entire world.
movie.description_full: When Sid accidentally destroys Manny's heirloom Christmas rock and ends up on Santa's naughty list, he leads a hilarious quest to the North Pole to make things right and ends up making things much worse. Now it's up to Manny and his prehistoric posse to band together and save Christmas for the entire world.

movies.title: The Double
movies.summary: A US senator's just been murdered, and it bears the marks of a Soviet assassin, who's long-thought to be dead. To hunt down the killer, a retired member of the CIA, who spent his career going toe-to-toe with his Soviet nemesis, is teamed with a young FBI agent.

movies.title: The King Is Dead!
movies.summary: A young couple buy a house but their neighbor is a drug dealer who originates many troubles so they create a plan to move him out.
movies.description_full: A young couple buy a house but their neighbor is a drug dealer who originates many troubles so they create a plan to move him out.

movies.title: Between Us
movies.summary: The film is about two couples who meet as old friends and discover their lives are tainted by money, success, sex and children.
movies.description_full: The film is about two couples who meet as old friends and discover their lives are tainted by money, success, sex and children.
movies.synopsis: The film is about two couples who meet as old friends and discover their lives are tainted by money, success, sex and children.

movies.title: Some Kind of Hate
movies.summary: Relentless bullying has turned Lincoln's life into a nightmare. But he soon learns the true meaning of terror when he is sent to a remote school for troubled teens and the harassments start all over again. Only this time, someone is watching - a teenage girl named Moira who was driven to suicide by vicious bullying years ago. When Lincoln accidentally summons Moira from the grave, he unleashes a vengeful and unstoppable force on a mission of blood-soaked revenge.
